author: Jeff Rutstein
comment: This is my 1st review of an app... TimeWear Plus is by far the best timer app for any type of exercise.  I do Not have to have my phone with me on the gym floor,  Yaaaa!!!!  The developers are Awesome and respond and take into account any questions and suggestions.
title: The Best!!!

author: Andrew M
comment: Does exactly what I need. I use it on my Moto360 for air pistol practice and matches. Needed multiple presets for different types of exercises. Run this timer for 90 mins (match duration) - no negative impact on my watch battery. I like that I still get all my email and Google Now notifications while running the timer. Would be nice to have an option to change vibration when the timer ends.
title: Perfect for my smartwatch

reply.author: AYRatio
reply.content: Thanks for leaving your feedback, it helps to improve our product. We have just added two more intervals to each preset. This functionality is available in the version 3.1 - it has been released today! Hope this will make your experience with out app better.
